document_data.name: I Flounder an' Den I Lobster
document_data.mainbody: '''''I Flounder an' Den I Lobster''''' was a seafood pun-filled sea shanty from the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents:
{{quote|''I flounder an' den I lobster...
I flounder an' den I lobster...
But wit' all my sole, I know
She'll be a-swimmin' home to me...''|Pirate Jimmy}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''I Flounder an' Den I Lobster'' was sang at the [[Vulgar Monkey]], a dockside tavern on the island of [[Brynnlaw]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]]. The shanty was a favorite of [[Jimmy (pirate)|Pirate Jimmy's]].
